byline.contributor: Steven Yaccino contributed reporting from Chicago, and Helene Cooper from Washington.

snippet: Russia’s accession to the W.T.O. has been a key goal of the “reset” between Russia and the United States, a reconciliation whose future is uncertain amid political change.
lead_paragraph: Russia’s accession to the W.T.O. has been a key goal of the “reset” between Russia and the United States, a reconciliation whose future is uncertain amid political change.

headline.main: Russia Declares It Is Close to Joining the World Trade Organization
headline.print_headline: Russia Declares It Is Close to Joining the World Trade Organization
headline.seo: Russia Says It’s Close to Joining the W.T.O.
